ygData.msgSnippet: Ominous Prime, clad in silver armor that reflected the sun in a glory befitting a creator and master of a new race of Transformers, arrived on te battle scene.

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Ominous Prime, clad in silver armor that reflected the sun in a glory 
befitting a creator and master of a new race of Transformers, arrived on te 
battle scene. His team of 5 Energonian settled down on the north eastern 
zone. From the vantage point they could see Hell Beast and oppisite they 
could see Marine. 
       "Akron, Venus, and Quasar will go with Hell Beast. Myself, Odiphious, 
and Putnam will aid Marine. Go, now." Ominous said, loading his energon 
blaster.
       The two teams of three split. Ominous, and the other two energonians 
came from behinde the blast that Marine had delivered. warily, they waited 
until the smoke cleared before they opened fire on anything. Besides, the 
cahos around them filled there optics with delicious detail.

--part1_31.1324defd.2804f1eb_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
